admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia
subsc: Agricultural extension and research,Central government administration,Forestry
trustfund: TF040921-GEORGIA: FORESTS DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF025144-PHRD-FORESTRY DEVELOPMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Forests Development
            Project is to establish sound forest management systems that
            maximize the contribution of Georgia's forests to
            economic development and rural poverty reduction on an
            environmentally sustainable basis. There are three main
            project components. The first improves forest sector
            governnance through national regulatory, financial, and
            institutional reforms. The second component improves forest
            planning and management in the Central Caucasus pilot area.
            The third component supports forest protection and
            reforestation in selected priority areas.
